# ms-dotnettools.dotnet-interactive-vscode Cache

Stores the `ms-dotnettools.dotnet-interactive-vscode` VSIX in a dedicated Docker volume.

- **Cache path**: `/opt/extensions/ms-dotnettools.dotnet-interactive-vscode`
- **Named volume**: `aspire_ms_dotnettools_dotnet_interactive_vscode_extension_cache`
- **Service**: `ms-dotnettools-dotnet-interactive-vscode-extension`
